### Steps to reproduce

The comments say that no-breaking space and no-breaking hyphen (hard hyphen) should not break a word, but the code uses them as delimiters to break words.

Changing code would break the current behavior, but it's not clear if the comments are just wrong ...

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/fea4484986d46069462045c713e04473f67b76a0/src/System.Management.Automation/FormatAndOutput/common/ComplexWriter.cs#L369-L378



### Expected behavior

```console
Comments should reflect the cod, not contradict with the code.
```


### Actual behavior

```console
Comments contradict with the code.
```
